io.scanbot.sdk.camera

Class AutoSnappingController

  • BaseAutoSnappingController
    • io.scanbot.sdk.camera.AutoSnappingController

  • public class AutoSnappingController
extends BaseAutoSnappingController

    Controls auto-snapping process by observing contour detection results from class ContourDetectorFrameHandler.

    See Also:
    class ContourDetectorFrameHandler

    • Constructor Detail

      • AutoSnappingController

        public AutoSnappingController(@NonNull
                              IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                              @NonNull
                              ContourDetectorFrameHandler frameHandler)

        Constructs the instance of class AutoSnappingController with given frame contour detector handler You may want clear the frame handler after the usage by detaching the class AutoSnappingController

        Parameters:
        cameraView - camera view which is used for snapping
        frameHandler - class ContourDetectorFrameHandler which will be attached to camera.
        See Also:
        class AutoSnappingController, class AutoSnappingController

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public static AutoSnappingController attach(IScanbotCameraView cameraView)

        Same as io.scanbot.sdk.camera.AutoSnappingController$attach(io.scanbot.sdk.ui.camera.IScanbotCameraView,io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector.ContourDetectorFrameHandler), but creates new class ContourDetectorFrameHandler which will be attached to camera.

        Use this method if you don't need to control contour detection routine. However, be careful to not accidentally attach several class ContourDetectorFrameHandler to camera therefore causing contour detection to be executed more than once.

        See Also:
        io.scanbot.sdk.camera.AutoSnappingController$attach(io.scanbot.sdk.ui.camera.IScanbotCameraView,io.scanbot.sdk.contourdetector.ContourDetectorFrameHandler), class ContourDetectorFrameHandler, class ContourDetectorFrameHandler

      • attach

        public static AutoSnappingController attach(IScanbotCameraView cameraView,
                                            ContourDetectorFrameHandler contourDetectorFrameHandler)

        Convenience method for attaching class AutoSnappingController to camera view and class ContourDetectorFrameHandler.

        Auto-snapping is enabled by default as soon as you create new instance of class AutoSnappingController. You can manually enable or disable auto-snapping by calling io.scanbot.sdk.camera.BaseAutoSnappingController$setEnabled(kotlin.Boolean).

        Parameters:
        cameraView - camera view which is used for snapping
        contourDetectorFrameHandler - class ContourDetectorFrameHandler which will be attached to camera.
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@1333ae40: new class AutoSnappingController
        See Also:
        class AutoSnappingController, class ContourDetectorFrameHandler, class AutoSnappingController, io.scanbot.sdk.camera.BaseAutoSnappingController$setEnabled(kotlin.Boolean)

      • detach

        public void detach()

        Allows to detach the class AutoSnappingController from initial @{link class ContourDetectorFrameHandler}

        See Also:
        class AutoSnappingController, class ContourDetectorFrameHandler
